item.title: PureMix v0.1.0-alpha.0.2 Released - Versioned Documentation & Mobile Improvements
item.description:
We're excited to announce PureMix v0.1.0-alpha.0.2 with major improvements:

  • Versioned Documentation System: Automatic version management with picker UI
  • Mobile Responsiveness: Fixed horizontal overflow and improved mobile experience
  • SEO Optimization: Complete Open Graph, Twitter Cards, and structured data
  • Social Sharing: Interactive sharing buttons for Twitter, LinkedIn, WhatsApp, and Facebook
  • Template Engine: Fixed {content} variable usage and main.puremix layout resolution
  • Documentation: Comprehensive configuration guide and migration instructions

Get the latest version with: npm install puremix@latest
item.dc:creator: PureMix Team

item.title: PureMix v0.1.0-alpha.0.1 - Initial Alpha Release
item.description:
PureMix v0.1.0-alpha.0.1 marks our initial public alpha release with:

  • Core Framework: Server-side rendering with .puremix files
  • Python Integration: Seamless Python/JavaScript interop
  • Component System: React-style props and selective updates
  • Template Engine: AST-based processing without regex
  • CLI Tools: Project creation and development server

Try it out: npx puremix create my-app --template basic
item.dc:creator: PureMix Team

item.title: Complete Documentation Available - From Getting Started to Production Deployment
item.description:
The PureMix documentation is now comprehensive and includes:

  • Getting Started: Installation, quick start, and project structure
  • Core Concepts: Loaders, actions, components, and routing
  • Python Integration: From basic scripts to machine learning
  • Configuration: Complete framework options and environment variables
  • Deployment: PM2, Docker, Nginx, and production best practices
  • Troubleshooting: Common issues and solutions

Perfect for developers looking to master PureMix!

item.title: Python Integration Deep Dive - Use Pandas, NumPy, and ML in Your Web Apps
item.description:
Discover PureMix's powerful Python integration capabilities:

  • Process Pools: 4 dedicated Python workers for performance
  • Popular Libraries: Native support for Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn
  • Six Integration Methods: From script tags to ES6 imports
  • Error Handling: Graceful fallbacks when Python is unavailable
  • Type Safety: Python functions callable like JavaScript modules

Perfect for data-driven web applications and ML-powered features!
item.dc:creator: PureMix Team

item.title: Getting Started with PureMix - Build Your First App in 5 Minutes
item.description:
Learn how to create your first PureMix application:

  1. Installation: npx puremix create my-app
  2. Choose Template: Basic, Minimal, or Advanced
  3. Start Development: cd my-app && npm run dev
  4. Add Components: Create reusable .puremix components
  5. Integrate Python: Add server-side Python functions

No build step required - Node.js 22+ has native TypeScript support!
